description: Delivering dependable 40+ UPF sun protection and ingenious on-the-water functionality, the Tropic Comfort Natural Hoody features our modal fabric. Engineered from renewable, natural beech tree pulp, modal is super-soft and breathable yet durable for the most demanding hot-weather conditions. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Tropic Comfort Natural Hoody - Mens

specs.value: Classic hoody silhouette with generous hood is designed to fit over a baseball cap for additional sun protection
